name: Bandit
effect: On hit, grants a 10-[30]% chance  to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
maxLevelBonus:
When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s.

+

name: Battery
effect: Ranged Hits increase the next weakspot Hit by 10-[20]% per stack. Max 5 Stacks.
maxLevelBonus: At Max Stacks, the next weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.

name: Bulletweaver
effect: Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10-[20]% for 7s.
maxLevelBonus: Reloading from empty increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.

name: Deadly Calm
effect: Continuously Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10-[20]% over 3s.
maxLevelBonus: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.

name: Dervish
effect: Increases Melee Damage by 10-[40]% for 10s when activating a Skill.
maxLevelBonus: Melee kills reduce skill cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.

name: Disengange
effect:
Melee Strikes increase the damage of the next Backdash Evade Attack by 4-[10]%. Max 5 Stacks.
Lasts 7.5s.
maxLevelBonus: Perfect Neutral Evades grants 5 stacks

name: Extender
effect: Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 20-[40]%.
maxLevelBonus: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15% when reloading from empty.

name: Failsafe
effect: Attached Mod deals 10-[20]% additional Mod Damage.
maxLevelBonus: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chace to not consume charge.

name: Feedback
effect: Using this weapon's Mod generates 10-[20]% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
maxLevelBonus: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.

name: Ghost Shell
effect: After 3 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20-[40]%.
maxLevelBonus: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.

name: Harmonizer
effect: Increases Mod Damage by 10-[20]%.
maxLevelBonus: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.

name: Lithely
effect: Increases this weapon's Reload Speed by 4-[7]% for each enemy killed between reloads. lasts 15s Max 5 Stacks.
maxLevelBonus: Reloading this weapon at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% by 15s

name: Misfortune
effect: Increase Melee damage by 5-[8]% for each unique Negative Status the target is suffering from.
maxLevelBonus: Melee Attacks apply SLOW for 2s.

name: Momentum
effect: When this weapon scores a Critical Hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5-[3]% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
maxLevelBonus: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.

name: Overdrive
effect: Melee Critical Hits increase Melee Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 5% for 7.5-[15]s. stacking up to 5 times.
maxLevelBonus: Melee Critical Strikes deal 20% additional damage.

name: Refunder
effect: Shots from this weapon have a 20-[30]% chance to return Ammo to reserves.
maxLevelBonus: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.

name: Reinvigorate
effect: Reduces the Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25-[50]%.
maxLevelBonus: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.

name: Resentment
effect: Gain 10-[30]% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present.
maxLevelBonus: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack

name: Shield Breaker
effect: Melee Attacks grants a Shield for 2-4% of Max Health. Max 20-40%. Last 10s.
maxLevelBonus: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.

name: Slayer
effect: Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10-[20]%. Last 3s.
maxLevelBonus: Increases reload Speed by 15%.

name: Steadfast
effect: Charged Melee Attacks cannot be interrupted and gain 10-[20]% damage reduction from all sources.
maxLevelBonus: All damage taken during Charged Melee Attack is covered to Grey Health.

name: Striker
effect: Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3-6% for 10s Max 5 Stacks.
maxLevelBonus: Increases Movement Speed by 2% per stack.

name: Supercharger
effect: Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10-[30]%.
maxLevelBonus: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rigles gain 15% Critical Chance.

name: Timewave
effect: Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 5-[7]s.
maxLevelBonus: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.

name: Transference
effect: Melee Hits generate 5% Ammo Reserves for both Firearms. Cooldown 10-[5]s.
maxLevelBonus: When a Firearm reserve is full, melee Strikes generate 25% additional Mod Power for that weapon.

name: Transpose
effect: Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10-[20]% for 20s.
maxLevelBonus: Ammo pickups are added directly to into this weapon's magazine.

name: Twisting Wounds
effect: Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10-[20]% to BLEEDING targets.
maxLevelBonus: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 100 BLEED damage over 10s.

name: Vampire Blade
effect: Increases Melee Damage by 10-[25]% while within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.
maxLevelBonus: Melee Hits vs BLEEDING targets will Lifesteal 3% of base damage dealt.

name: Vengeful Strike
effect: Increases Melee damage by 20-[50]% when below 50% Max Health.
maxLevelBonus: Increases Melee Critical Chance by 15% when below 50% Max Health.

name: Weaponlord
effect: Basic Melee Attacks increase the next Charge Attacks by 7%. Max 5 Stacks.
maxLevelBonus: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.
